display_long_description:
Yeti Hunt is a horror survival VR game where you play as a brave hunter searching for a mysterious beast deep in the northern forest. Rumors tell of people vanishing in the wilderness, only to be found dead later. The Jasper newspapers recently reported the disappearance of a group of tourists in the national park. While the police believe it was an accident caused by a rafting trip gone wrong, your team is certain that something far more sinister is at play—one of the most elusive creatures of legend, the Sasquatch. Determined to uncover the truth, you venture into the unknown, facing the terrifying dangers that lurk in the shadows.

In this intense VR hunting experience, you must track and battle not only the Yeti, but also Bigfoot and other giant monsters hidden deep within the wilderness. Your journey takes you through hauntingly beautiful and deadly environments—from snow-covered peaks and foggy green jungles to lava-filled mountains. Each landscape is filled with dense mist, wild animals, and eerie sounds that keep you on edge.

You are not alone in this dangerous mission. By your side is a loyal wolf companion, trained to track monsters and uncover hidden dangers. The wolf helps you follow the trail, navigate through the thick fog, and alert you to unseen threats lurking in the darkness. But survival will not be easy—your weapons, skills, and courage will be put to the test as you hunt down these legendary creatures while trying to survive the terrifying environment.
